price: Noah said, “My Lord, do not leave on earth a single disbeliever.
arabic: وَقَالَ نُوحٞ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرۡ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ دَيَّارًا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
